availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Campbell County, Kentucky. A Kentucky-born farmer. Son of John and Elizabeth Murnan. Married Elizabeth Weir.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, Entry for Charles Murnan (1803-1892), Find A Grave Memorial # 91357572, Evergreen Cemetery, Southgate, Campbell County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=MUR&GSpartial=1&GSbyrel=all&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSsr=201&GRid=91357572& (accessed 5 Jun 2017).
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, 2nd District, p. 148.
